mapper.select:
SELECT PI.id, PI.catalog, PI.prefix, PI.name, PI.version, PI.installed, PI.valid, PI.author, PI.priority, PI.remark, PI.lastUpdateDate, PI.createDate, PI.settingUrl, PI.describeUrl, PI.installUrl, PI.uninstallUrl FROM BD_PLUGIN_INSTANCE PI WHERE
AND PI.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BD_PLUGIN_INSTANCE ( id, catalog, lastUpdateDate, name, valid, author, createDate, prefix, remark, installUrl, settingUrl, version, describeUrl, priority, installed, uninstallUrl ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{catalog}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{name}, #{valid}, #{author}, #{createDate}, #{prefix}, #{remark}, #{installUrl}, #{settingUrl}, #{version}, #{describeUrl}, #{priority}, #{installed}, #{uninstallUrl} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BD_PLUGIN_INSTANCE WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE BD_PLUGIN_INSTANCE
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
catalog = #{catalog,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
author = #{author,javaType=java.lang.String},
prefix = #{prefix,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
installUrl = #{installUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
settingUrl = #{settingUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
version = #{version,javaType=java.lang.String},
describeUrl = #{describeUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
priority = #{priority,javaType=int},
installed = #{installed,javaType=boolean},
uninstallUrl = #{uninstallUrl,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
